LanguageData.RSS.LimitItems.Desc: Removes all items tagged with tech-level spacer
LanguageData.RSS.LimitResearch.Desc: Removes all research-projects tagged with tech-level spacer
LanguageData.RSS.LimitFactions.Desc: Removes all factions tagged with tech-level spacer
LanguageData.RSS.LimitPawnKinds.Desc: Removes all pawnkinds tagged with tech-level spacer
LanguageData.RSS.LogRemovals.Desc: Logs all removed items at game-start
LanguageData.RSS.RestartInfo: NOTE: Any changes require a restart to have effect
